headline: Ask HN: What's Next for Souls (FromSoftware)? An MMO?
description:
After putting in over 100 hours on my two Elden Ring's characters it dawned on me that FromSoftware could easily / next move Souls into the MMO space. I know it's common to compare E.R. to Breath of the Wild (and I don't disagree), but for me this game feels more like Souls combat has been grafted onto WoW, in a good way. The vastness, the exploration, the 'holy shit' moments when you realize you just dropped into the wrong neighborhood (I ran Torrent right between TWO dragon's in Caleid last night... oops). Yeah, I just get a ton of WoW nostalgia more than anything playing Elden Ring and it got me thinking about how a Souls MMO could actually work.

I just don't know if it's something FromSoftware wants/needs to do, MMO's (I think?) aren't the huge money makers they use to be, but maybe the cost of building/hosting such a backend isn't as bad now that it's a somewhat known/solved thing(?).

Anyway... just taking a break and of course still thinking about ER too much.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 灵魂》（FromSoftware）的下一步是什么？一个网络游戏？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 靈魂》（FromSoftware）的下一步是什麼？一個網絡遊戲？
description_zh-Hans:
在对我的两个Elden Ring的角色投入了100多个小时后，我恍然大悟，FromSoftware可以轻松地/下一步将《灵魂》搬到MMO空间。我知道将《E.R.》与《荒野之息》相提并论是很常见的（我也不反对），但对我来说，这个游戏感觉更像是将《灵魂》的战斗嫁接到了《WoW》上，而且是以一种好的方式。 浩瀚无边，探索，当你意识到你刚刚掉进了错误的区域时的 "该死的 "时刻（我昨晚在卡利德的两条龙之间跑了Torrent...哎呀）。是的，我在玩《Elden Ring》时得到了大量的WoW怀旧情绪，这让我想到了《Souls》的MMO游戏可以真正发挥作用。

我只是不知道这是否是FromSoftware想要/需要做的事情，MMO（我认为？

无论如何......只是休息一下，当然还是想太多关于ER的事情。
